message: I just scanned a qr code on a guy's shirt, and it told me all about him.  great idea.
Just wanted to have a place to LiveBlog SWBaltimore.  I'll be capturing my thoughts here and blogging later.
pitch line forming,  first pitch under way.
I just pitched. I really should have practiced beforehand.
I was half expecting to be the oldest person here (I'm 34).  Way wrong.

Day 2.  I've been too busy to update this as frequently as I expected.  3 and a quarter hours of sleep, and our team is dumb enough to be working on TWO ideas, and dumber enough to think that we can still win.
demo day.  we built 2 products, but the most complete is mappablelinks.com.  The website isn't there, but the actual product works 100%.
